alt: Kallon City Hall building with modern architecture
title: City Hall
description: The historic City Hall building, constructed in 1925, is a centerpiece of our downtown area.

alt: Central Park with lush greenery and walking paths
title: Central Park
description: Our 50-acre Central Park features walking trails, playgrounds, and summer concert series.

alt: Vibrant downtown street with shops and restaurants
title: Downtown District
description: The heart of Kallon's business and entertainment scene with local shops and eateries.

alt: Kallon High School building with sports fields
title: Kallon High School
description: Our award-winning high school serves over 1,200 students with excellent programs.

alt: Modern public library with glass facade
title: Public Library
description: The Kallon Public Library offers over 100,000 volumes and community programs.

alt: Scenic riverfront with walking path and benches
title: Riverfront Park
description: Enjoy our beautiful riverfront with walking paths, fishing piers, and picnic areas.

title: History Museum
description: Explore Kallon's rich history through interactive exhibits and artifacts.

alt: Busy farmers market with vendors and customers
title: Farmers Market
description: Our weekly farmers market features local produce, crafts, and live music.
